Select the timezone according to the location

  1. Setup the correct timezone. For e.g. North America / Chicago
    sudo timedatectl set-timezone America/Chicago
  2. Setup the correct timezone. For e.g. Europe / Brussel
    sudo timedatectl set-timezone Europe/Brussels
  3. Setup the correct timezone. For e.g. Asia / Shanghai
    sudo timedatectl set-timezone Asia/Shanghai
  4. For TA2 TZ should be setup by appanding the following to:
    cat << EOF >> /etc/profile
TZ=NFT-1DFT,M3.5.0,M10.5.0
export TZ
EOF

cat << EOF >> /etc/csh.cshrc
setenv TZ NFT-1DFT,M3.5.0,M10.5.0
EOF
  5. For GPDM TZ should be setup by appanding the following to:
    cat << EOF >> /etc/profile
TZ=GMT0BST,M3.5.0,M10.5.0
export TZ
EOF

cat << EOF >> /etc/csh.cshrc
setenv TZ=GMT0BST,M3.5.0,M10.5.0
EOF
